channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Pipeline Maven Integration Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Pipeline Maven Integration Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2235|2024-08-04T07:01:41.114Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%20maven%20integration%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Pipeline Maven Integration Plugin 3.8.2 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified JDBC URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, potentially capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2020-2256|2024-08-04T07:01:41.290Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%20maven%20integration%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline Maven Integration Plugin 3.9.2 and earlier does not escape the upstream job's display name shown as part of a build cause, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Job/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2020-2234|2024-08-04T07:01:41.133Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%20maven%20integration%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Pipeline Maven Integration Plugin 3.8.2 and earlier allows users with Overall/Read access to connect to an attacker-specified JDBC URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, potentially capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2020-2233|2024-08-04T07:01:41.251Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%20maven%20integration%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Pipeline Maven Integration Plugin 3.8.2 and earlier allows users with Overall/Read access to enumerate credentials ID of credentials stored in Jenkins.
